text: hananim oeeneun sin-i eobs-eumyeo geubun-eun wang-isiyo seongseuleoun bun-i simyeo pyeonghwaleul jusigo anjeon-eul suyeo hasineun bun-imyeo modeun geos-eul jikyeoju sineun bun-isimyeo gajang widaehasigo gwonsewa modeun widaeham-ui soyujaisi la geudeul-i biyuhaneun modeun geos wie gyesin hananimkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo
